text: Andrea Bowen (born March 4, 1990 near Columbus, Ohio) is an American actress.1990: Andrea Bowen | Biography and Filmography | 1990, accessdate: October 23, 2015 She acts mostly in television programs. She acted as the character Julie in the TV show Desperate Housewives. She has gotten a few SAG awards for her television work. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Columbus, Ohio
title: Andrea Bowen
